mapper.select: select date_format(i.start_time, '%Y-%m') as bid_month, count(b.bid_id) as total_bids, count(distinct b.user_id) as total_users, (count(b.bid_id) / count(distinct b.user_id)) as competition_rate from Bid b left join Item i on b.item_id = i.item_id group by date_format(i.start_time, '%Y-%m') order by bid_month asc
select round((select count(item_id) from Bid) / (select count(distinct user_id) from Bid), 2) as competition_rate

select date_format(b.bid_time, '%Y-%m') as bid_month, count(b.bid_id) as total_bids, count(distinct b.user_id) as total_users, (count(b.bid_id) / count(distinct b.user_id)) as competition_rate from Bid b group by date_format(b.bid_time, '%Y-%m') order by bid_month asc

select i.code as category_code, count(b.bid_id) as total_bids, count(distinct b.user_id) as total_users, round((count(b.bid_id) / count(distinct b.user_id)),2) as competition_rate from Item i left join Bid b on i.item_id = b.item_id group by i.code order by category_code
select b.item_id, i.name as itemName, count(distinct b.user_id) as participantCount from Bid b join Item i on b.item_id = i.item_id group by b.item_id, i.name order by participantCount desc limit 10

select i.code, c.name as categoryName, count(i.item_id) * 100.0 / (select count(*) from Item) as categoryPercentage from Item i join Category c on i.code = c.code group by i.code, c.name order by categoryPercentage desc

select c.name as category_name, sum(b.price) as total_revenue from Item i left join Bid b on i.item_id = b.item_id and b.is_success = 1 join Category c on i.code = c.code group by c.name order by c.name

select c.name as categoryName, coalesce(sum(b.price), 0) as totalRevenue from Category c left join Item i on c.code = i.code left join Bid b on i.item_id = b.item_id and b.is_success = 1 group by c.name order by c.name

select c.name as categoryName, coalesce(min(b.price), 0) as minBidPrice, coalesce(max(b.price), 0) as maxBidPrice from Item i left join Bid b on i.item_id = b.item_id and b.is_success = 1 join Category c on i.code = c.code group by c.name order by c.name

select c.name as category_name, date_format(i.end_time, '%Y-%m') as month, sum(b.price) as monthly_revenue from Item i left join Bid b on i.item_id = b.item_id and b.is_success = 1 join Category c on i.code = c.code group by c.name, date_format(i.end_time, '%Y-%m') order by c.name, month
select c.id as customsId, c.name as customsName, count(i.item_id) as itemCount from Customs c left join Item i on c.id = i.customs_id group by c.id, c.name order by itemCount desc
